subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Due to {{w|Han unification}}, the {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} containing {{l|mul|冊}} and {{w|Simplified Chinese|simplified form}} containing {{l|mul|册}} are encoded under the same [[code point]]. Depending on the font installed, this character may appear to be either {{lang|zh|sc=Hant|笧}} or {{lang|zh|sc=Hans|笧}}.
